item.title: Space
item.description:
Readings

  • Chapter 15: Visualizing geospatial data of Fundamentals of Data Visualization

Optional readings

  • Chapter 7: Draw maps of Data Visualization
  • Drawing beautiful maps programmatically with R, sf and ggplot2
  • Vox: Why all world maps are wrong
  • Bloomberg: When maps lie
  • xkcd: Map projections

Guiding questions

  • How can you know if a map projection is truthful or misleading?
  • What’s wrong (or not wrong) with using points on maps? Choropleths? Lines?

item.description:

item.title: Welcome to AEM 2850 / 5850!
item.description:
Readings

  • Read the syllabus
  • Review the schedule
  • Read the assignments overview
  • Skim the introduction of R for Data Science (2e)
  • Read chapter 28: Quarto of R for Data Science (2e)
  • Skim chapter 1, through section 1.2 of Data Visualization

Optional readings

  • Study: Charts change hearts and minds better than words do
  • Tim Harford, “Florence Nightingale: Data Viz Pioneer," 99% Invisible

Guiding questions

  • What is this course all about? I wonder if that’s on the syllabus…
  • What is R? I bet that’s on the syllabus…
  • Can I succeed in this course? (yes! according to the syllabus…)
  • Wait, should I read the syllabus? (here’s a hint)
  • Why do we visualize data?
  • What makes a great visualization?
